title: SpiderOak demonstrates zero-trust software on ISS
summary: SpiderOak announced the successful demonstration of its OrbitSecure zero-trust cybersecurity software on the International Space Station.

title: TransAstra claims NASA contract for debris capture bag
summary: Space logistics startup TransAstra won a NASA contract to manufacture a bag to capture orbital debris.

title: Virgin Galactic’s president explains how VSS Unity is now flying frequently
summary: "I don't think I'll run out of people who are willing to fly the spaceship any time soon."

title: Benchmark wins AFRL award to develop thrusters for ASCENT
summary: Benchmark Space Systems won a $2.81 million U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory contract to continue development and testing of thrusters running on Advanced Spacecraft Energetic Non-Toxic, ASCENT, fuel.

title: Op-ed | Welcome to the Third Space Age
summary: As the commercial sector takes the lead on developing digital age technology and capabilities in this Third Space Age, the national security sector will become a demanding customer.
